hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Build kernel for arm64
echo "CONFIG_MODULES=n" > kernel/configs/builtin.config ARCH=arm64 CROSS_COMPILE=aarch64-linux-gnu- make defconfig kvm_guest.config builtin.config ARCH=arm64 CROSS_COMPILE=aarch64-linux-gnu- make Image.gz vmlinux -j$(nproc) cp .config arch/arm64/boot/config

# Publish the kernel to our file server (using FTP) FILESERVER=fileserver
VERSION=$(make kernelversion) cp arch/arm64/boot/Image.gz Image-${VERSION}.gz
ftp -n << EOF open ${FILESERVER} user anonymous cd linux put Image-${VERSION}.gz EOF
rm Image-${VERSION}.gz

#!/bin/bash
# Submit for testing SQUAD_SERVER=squad SQUAD_BACKEND=lava.server SQUAD_TOKEN=2d703e793ea345efdbab52d95fe33ec715bcc2d4 SQUAD_GROUP=Linaro SQUAD_PROJECT=linux-mainline FILESERVER=fileserver LAVA_JOB_TEMPLATES=("http://${FILESERVER}/job-templates/qemu-linux-busybox.yaml \ http://${FILESERVER}/job-templates/qemu-linux-nonreg.yaml")
# Kernel version VERSION=$(make kernelversion)
# Substitute with build info export KERNEL_URL=http://${FILESERVER}/linux/Image-${VERSION}.gz export ROOTFS_URL=https://people.linaro.org/~loic.poulain/micro-rootfs/micro-rootfs-dev-aarch64.ext2.gz export COMMIT_ID=$(git rev-parse HEAD)
for url in ${LAVA_JOB_TEMPLATES}; do # Download job template wget ${url} -O lava_job_template.yaml
# Generate LAVA job envsubst < lava_job_template.yaml > lava_job.yaml LAVA_JOB_DEFINITION=$(cat lava_job.yaml)
# Submit to SQUAD (and to LAVA via SQUAD) curl \ --header "Auth-Token: ${SQUAD_TOKEN}" \ --form backend=${SQUAD_BACKEND} \ --form definition="${LAVA_JOB_DEFINITION}" \ http://${SQUAD_SERVER}/api/submitjob/${SQUAD_GROUP}/${SQUAD_PROJECT}/${VERSION}/jenkins done
